publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1337 Ross Finnie: The Welfare of Farmed Animals (Scotland) Regulations 2000-That the Rural Affairs Committee recommends that the draft The Welfare of Farmed Animals (Scotland) Regulations be approved. Supported by: Rhona Brankin*
